document_title: Headache: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_name: dau-dau.json_2_Subjects at high risk of headaches
subsection_content:
People who often work continuously on computers are at high risk of headaches
Headaches are extremely common and can occur in anyone. However, the most common objects are:
Women: In general, the incidence of headaches in women is higher than in men, especially migraines. Migraines can appear due to changes in female sex hormones. Pain easily occurs during menstruation and menopause; People who regularly use alcohol, beer, coffee, cigarettes and stimulants; People who are often stressed, people who often worry; People who often work with computers without breaks: office workers, computer graphic designers, IT staff...; People whose parents, siblings, or siblings suffer from migraines.
subsection_title: dau dau.json. Subjects at high risk of headaches
